DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the carriage rate of Streptococcus pneumoniae in the nasopharynx of healthy children and the carriage rate and distribution of Streptococcus pneumoniae serotypes
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Streptococcus Pneumoniae Serotype Carriage Rate for Nasopharyngeal Carriage in Filipino Children
DOC.criteria: Healthy children aged between 2 months and 5 years attending the well baby clinic in hospital. Informed consent obtained from parents or legal guardian.
